episodes.title: How Diddy's Childhood Turned Him Into A Monster
episodes.description:
True crime and mental illness from a professional viewpoint 🧠

Welcome to my channel ✨

I’m Dr Sohom Das, a leading UK based consultant psychiatrist and expert witness who is here to dissect true crime cases and criminal stories from a mental health perspective.

I’ve assessed hundreds of patients in prisons, secure psych wards and courts across the UK and have often dealt with the worst of humanity - shocking cases from arson to murder, diagnosing the likes of schizophrenia, PTSD, and personality disorders.

Now I want to use all my years of experience on the front line to share my professional thoughts and opinions to help you unpack the most jaw dropping and fascinating criminal cases in the world.

F: @apsychforsoreminds
TT: @psychforsoreminds
I: @psychforsoreminds
X: @psychsore

Social media enquiries: danni@joypeddlers.com
All other enquiries: debbie@arlingtontalent.com

episodes.title: The Manson Family Cult - How Cult Leaders Are Able To Gain A Following
episodes.description:
Hello cruel world,

In this video, I will dive deep into the psychology of the infamous Manson Family, analyzing the mental states, behaviours, and motivations behind Charles Manson and his followers. 

Through a clinical lens, we will explore the complex dynamics of the group, examining Manson's influence, the manipulation tactics he used, and the psychological profiles of those who committed heinous crimes under his direction.

Dr Das
____________________________________________

True crime and mental illness from a professional viewpoint 🧠

Welcome to my channel ✨

I’m Dr Sohom Das, a leading UK based consultant psychiatrist and expert witness who is here to dissect true crime cases and criminal stories from a mental health perspective.

I’ve assessed hundreds of patients in prisons, secure psych wards and courts across the UK and have often dealt with the worst of humanity - shocking cases from arson to murder, diagnosing the likes of schizophrenia, PTSD, and personality disorders.

Now I want to use all my years of experience on the front line to share my professional thoughts and opinions to help you unpack the most jaw dropping and fascinating criminal cases in the world.

F: @apsychforsoreminds
TT: @psychforsoreminds
I: @psychforsoreminds

All other enquiries: debbie@arlingtontalent.com

episodes.title: Is DIDDY really S*ICIDAL?? (PRISON psychiatrist's EXPERT opinion) - PART 3
episodes.description:
Whattup my Psych for Sore Guys (and gals)

The whole world and its grandmother knows about the horrific allegations that DIDDY is facing.

My previous video, PART 1, was an examination of DIDDY's psychiatric makeup and personality traits. LINK:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EVJAFSQ4CuY&t=956s

In PART 2, I delve into whether he could use his diagnosis as a psychiatric defence. I also talked about how DIDDY would be treated in prison. LINK:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LvEx9fIGvws&t=742s

In this video (PART 3):

Sean “Diddy” Combs has been placed on suicide watch inside  Brooklyn’s Metropolitan Detention Center  where he awaits trial for his alleged sex crimes.
The 54-year-old’s mental state is unclear, according to a report.

In this episode:

What does suicide watch actually mean?
Is it carried out properly in prison?
What kind of health care is available for prisoners at risk of self harm?
Will DIDDY get transferred to psych unit?
What do I think is actual current suicidal risk is?

And of course, some awkward dad jokes along the way.

episodes.description:
Whattup my Psych for Sore Guys (and gals)

This vid dissects 5 myths about GASLIGHTING 

Gaslighting is a form of emotional abuse that manipulates someone into questioning their own sanity, memories, or perception of reality.

I'll give you a proper explanation / definition with specific examples and ACTUAL phrases you might hear if you’re being gaslighted.

episodes.title: Talk with ANDREW GOLD - threatened by Ex-Jehovah (Lloyd Evans) over scandal
episodes.description:
Investigative journalist (and Psych for Sore Mind friend) Andrew Gold recently got into a heated debate with one of the guests from his channel (On the Edge) - an ex-Jehovah's Witness named Lloyd Evans. This was after discussion of a recent scandal involving prostitutes. Lloyd Evans won't apologise to anyone but his wife. After the video, purportedly threatened to sue Andrew Gold if he talked to Lloyd's ex-colleague and producer (which Andrew did).

What was all the commotion about? Were Lloyd's actions all the more deplorable given his apparent position in protecting sex workers? Was Andrew right to push Lloyd's buttons? Did he you take it too far?

#Lloyd Evans #JehovahWitness #cult

episodes.title: Lori VALLOW and Chad DAYBELL Case | FORENSIC PSYCHIATRIST (Dr Das)
episodes.description:
In a dark case of alleged murder, Idaho 'Doomsday cult' couple Lori Vallow and Chad Daybell are charged with killing her two children, Tylee and JJ. Now Vallow has been declared unfit to stand trial throwing an unexpected twist in this already complex and ugly case.

✅ Don't Forget to LIKE 👍 SUBSCRIBE 🔔️️️ SHARE ↗️
↪️https://bit.ly/DrDas-PsychSore

When mental health and the law cross, as in this case with Lori Vallow, there's an overlap between psychiatry and treatment and the courts and legal process. This is exactly my area of expertise and where I assess patients and offenders and give testimony to the UK courts as an expert witness. In this video, I use this experience to breakdown the Vallow Daybell case.

𝗦𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝘃𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗼 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗮 𝗳𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱: https://youtu.be/_zNWA9KLVs0
